summary: INTERMITTENTLY WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS IN THE REVERSE WITH THE GEAR AND GAS PEDAL DEPRESSED, THE VEHICLE DIDN'T ACCELERATE OR WHEN IT WAS IN THE DRIVE GEAR AND GAS PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED, THE VEHICLE WOULD GO INTO REVERSE.   *AK   THIS PROBLEM OCCURRED THREE TIMES A WEEK WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS IN FIRST GEAR.  THE ENGINE REVVED, BUT THE VEHICLE DIDN'T MOVE.  THE CONSUMER'S FOOT WAS ON THE GAS, AND HAD NO IDEA THE VEHICLE WOULD MOVE.  THE VEHICLE HAD BEEN BACK TO THE DEALER ON THREE OCCASIONS;  THE FIRST TIME FOR WARRANTY, THE SECOND TIME THE VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT, AND THE THIRD TIME THE DEALER WASN'T SUCCESSFUL WITH FINDING THE PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER DISCOVERED FORD HAD PROBLEMS WITH THEIR TRANSMISSIONS.   *SCC    *JB
